content:
Great. Let's continue writing the article. Assist me with writing the content for the Conclusion. You must write in a logical and organized manner, using subheadings, bullet points, numbering, tables, and other tools to break up the text and make it easier to read. The content should have a word count of 50-100 words. I want you to include a call to action that encourage homeowners to get in touch for a free consultation
IX. Conclusion

Summary of the main points covered in the article
Importance of seeking legal advice and understanding the implications of a Deed of Novation.

Do not give me a generic answer. You are to act as an expert construction lawyer in Australia so it must reflect in your answers and also consider the related contents we discussed in our whole conversation. Make sure to not repeat or rephrase the same idea if you already provided them in the previous section of the content.
